text: James Downham DD was Dean of Armagh from 1667St Patrick's Cathedral, Armagh until his death in 1681.Armagh clergy and parishes : being an account of the clergy of the Church of Ireland in the Diocese of Armagh The son of Bishop George Downhame he was appointed a Prebendary of Tynan in St Patrick's Cathedral, Armagh in 1666."Fasti Ecclesiae Hibernicae: The succession of the prelates Volume 3" Cotton,H. p55 Dublin, Hodges & Smith, 1848-1878 ==References== Category:1681 deaths Category:17th-century Irish Anglican priests
title: James Downham
